treatment-md.title: Pseudapanteles mariobozai Fernandez-Triana, Janzen, Hallwachs, Whitfield, Smith & Kula, 2014, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Revision of the genus Pseudapanteles (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Microgastrinae), with emphasis on the species in Area de Conservacion Guanacaste, northwestern Costa Rica
